articles.description: Barbora Krejcikova holds off a charge from Jasmine Paolini in a gripping Wimbledon final to earn her second Grand Slam singles title.
articles.title: Wimbledon results 2024: Barbora Krecjikova beats Jasmine Paolini in women's final

articles.title: New Zealand 24-17 England: All Blacks maintain Eden Park record as England come close
